text: Philip Francis Linz (June 4, 1939 – December 9, 2020) was an American professional baseball player. Linz played in Major League Baseball for the New York Yankees (1962–65), Philadelphia Phillies (1966–67), and New York Mets (1967–68). He was born in Baltimore, Maryland. Linz died on December 9, 2020 at his home in Virginia at the age of 81.Yankees’ ‘Harmonica Incident’ protagonist Phil Linz dead at 81Phil Linz, Unlikely Baseball Celebrity, Is Dead at 81 ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:New York Yankees players Category:Philadelphia Phillies players Category:New York Mets players Category:Sportspeople from Baltimore
title: Phil Linz
